Message:
My little sister Soltina was
someone everyone loved—

You’d never guess
the two of us were sisters.

I can’t cook, I’m no good
at talking to others,

and I fail at anything
and everything I do.

Even this stuffed bear
I made for her looked horrible.
I must’ve gotten all the bad genes,
while Sol got all the good ones.

But I’ve never once
been jealous of her.

In fact, I’m proud to
call her my little sister.

As long as I have her,
I don’t need anything else.

I believed that from
the bottom of my heart.
